resources.string: Connect to the internet to have actual information.
DevConf is over. See you next year!
You haven\'t set any talks as your favorite ones yet.
Your feedback has been successfully posted.

"

The conference will be held at the Faculty of Information Technology, Brno University of Technology (FIT VUT), Božetěchova 2.

Local Transport

Public transportation in Brno is provided by DPMB which maintains 12 tram lines, 13 trolley-bus lines, and 37 bus lines. At night all public transportation is provided by 11 night bus lines. If you want to use public transportation, you must buy a ticket before you board the vehicle. You need to purchase a two-zone ticket for zones 100+101 for any stop in the city of Brno. Single journey tickets can be bought from machines (coins only) at many stops, or in "Tabak" stores. You need to validate the single journey ticket in the yellow validation machine when you enter the vehicle. Instructions how to pay for transportation in Brno can be found here.

SMS tickets: The DPMB also offers sms tickets. This service is only available for Czech SIM cards. To use the service, send a message with a code to 90206. The code for a 75-minute ticket (CZK 29) is BRNO. The code, BRNOD, is for an all-day ticket (CZK 99). After sending the message, you will receive a ticket via sms within a few minutes. If you do not have a Czech SIM card, you can use the mobile app, Sejf which is available in the Apple App Store and Google Play.

If you are staying in Brno for several days, consider buying a 5-day ticket, which costs CZK 250. There are several places where you can buy this ticket, but the most convenient one for you is probably the main railway station. You can buy it at any counter (look for the international counters because they are more likely to speak English). When you first use your ticket, be sure to validate it. You only have to validate your ticket once.

Brno Local Transport Timetable

Network of daytime tram and bus lines

Network of nighttime bus lines

Download the app "Jízdní řády" with all local timetables from the Apple App Store or Google Play.

Travelling From the Main Railway Station to the Venue

From the main train station, take a tram No.1 (towards Řečkovice). Get off at the Semilasso stop (after approx. 15 minutes). Take the street on the right, Metodějova. After 200 meters take the first street on the right, Božetěchova. Continue straight on for approximately 100 m. The university building is on your left side.

Travelling From the Main Bus Station to the Venue

From the Zvonařka bus station, take a bus No. 44 or 67. Get off at the Semilasso stop. Follow the street for 100 m and then take the street on the right, Božetěchova. After approximately 400 meters you will arrive at the university building.


1) DevConf venue, FIT VUT
2) Semilasso tram station, tram 1 towards Řečkovice
3) Semilasso tram station, tram 1 towards Ečerova (trough Main train station)
4) Semilasso bus stop - buses 30 and 84 from/to the Red Hat office

Travelling From the Main Railway Station to the Red Hat office

From the main train station take a tram No.12 (towards Technologický park). Get off at the Červinkova stop (for the FBC I and FBC II buildings) or at the Technologický park stop (for the TPB building ). This is approximately a 17 minute ride.

Travelling From the Main Bus Station to the Red Hat office

Take a tram No. 12 towards Technologický park and get off at the Červinkova stop (for the FBC I and FBC II buildings) or at the Technologický park stop (for the TPB building). To find a tram stop, walk in the direction your bus was traveling, and the tram stop is just across the street to your right. Alternatively, you can take a bus No. 44 or 67. Get off at the Skácelova stop and then take a tram No. 12 and follow the same instructions as above.

Travelling From the Red Hat office to the Venue

From the Červinkova tram stop (or the Technologický park stop for the TPB building), take a tram No. 12 towards Komárov. Get off at the Skácelova stop (the first stop from Červinkova, the third one from Technologický park). Take a bus No. 30, 84, or 53 from the bus stop at the corner diagonally opposite the tram stop you exited at. From the bus, get off at the Semilasso stop.

Travelling From Venue to the Red Hat office

From the Semilasso bus stop take a bus No. 30 or 44. Get off at the Skácelova stop. When you exit the bus, if you face in the direction the bus was traveling, the tram stop is across the street to your right.Take a tram No. 12 towards Technologický park and get off at Červinkova (the first stop, for FBC I and FBC II buildings) or Technologický park (the third stop, for the TPB building).


1) Red Hat office, buildings FBC I and FBC II
2) Červinkova tram stop - tram 12 from the main train station
3) Skácelova tram stop
4) Skácelova bus stop - buses 30 and 84 to the DevConf venue (Semilasso bus stop)

Travelling From the Main Train Station to the Hotels

Hotel Avanti: From the main train station take a tram No.1 (towards Řečkovice). Get off at the Hrnčířská stop (after approx. 10 minutes). See map to the hotel.

Hotel Vista: From the main train station take a tram No.1 (towards Řečkovice). Get off at the Hudcova stop (after approx. 20 minutes). See map to the hotel.

Hotel Continental: From the main train station take tram No.1 (towards Řečkovice). Get off at the stop Moravské náměstí (after apx 5 minutes). See map to the hotel.

Travelling From the Hotels to the Venue

Hotel Avanti: The nearest tram stop is Hrnčířská. Take a tram No. 1 (towards Řečkovice) or a tram No. 6 (towards Královo Pole nádraží) and get off at the Semilasso stop (approx. 5 minutes).

Hotel Vista: The nearest tram stop is Hudcova. Take a tram No. 1 towards Ečerova and get off at the Semilasso stop (the second stop).

Hotel Continental: The nearest tram stop is Moravské náměstí. Take a tram No. 1 (towards Řečkovice) or a tram No. 6 (towards Královo Pole nádraží) and get off at the Semilasso stop (approx. 10 minutes).

"

"

With this app you have an access to actual information about the conference schedule, venue, floor plan, social event and speakers.

You will even be able to receive notifications with actual information from DevConf!

Register here: http://bit.ly/devconf-cz-2017-registration.

Don\'t forget to sign in to be able to vote, to leave feedback for each talk, and to create a list of your favorite talks.

For the proper functionality the internet connection is required.

In case of any troubles with this mobile application, contact its author via email (jridky@redhat.com).

"

"

Where: club Fléda (www.fleda.cz)

When: Saturday, January 28 starting at 7:30 p.m.

Capacity: 700 people (TICKET REQUIRED - see below for more details)

What: Food, drinks and socializing. Come on time, or you might miss it!

Map: follow map link.

How to get tickets

Most tickets will be handed out on a 'first-come, first-served' basis, starting on Friday morning

Some tickets will be held in reserve and distributed on Saturday morning for those who attend the event starting Saturday morning

Some tickets will also be held in reserve and distributed by Red Hat HR at the Red Hat HR stand / booth.

"
